name: Signal Design
tagline: Provides local agency service w/ global experience
description:
Signal is a creative agency that develops effective communication programs to generate solid results. For over 20 years, our clients have trusted our experience, innovation, and capabilities to accomplish their strategic business objectives in web design, brand identity and more. We help our clients connect and communicate with their customers in creative and intelligent ways.

Signal makes a good fit as the “local agency” for global companies, complementing their agencies of record and in-house marketing resources. For these clients we serve as a special forces unit supplying responsive, dependable support in the creative and digital realms.
Established in 1992, Signal has offices located in Raleigh and Wilmington, North Carolina.
